item.title: Need a tut on how 2
item.dc:creator: @MoparOwnsJoo MoparOwnsJoo
item.description:
@MoparOwnsJoo wrote:

I could find a tut so ill just explain:

how to make a command give you items -

else if (command.startsWith(“COMMAND NAME HERE”))
{
addItem(Item Id,Amount);

	}

Just fill that in and you got a command that gives you items. Search end of frame testing - and post your commands under it

how to make a command tele you -

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMAND NAME HERE”))
{
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = YYYY;
sendMessage(“MESSAGE HERE TO SEND THE PLAYER”);
}

Fill in the XXXX coords and the YYYY coords and add it under end of frame testing in client.java
Also the third line the send message line is optional, you can erase it if you want

Read full topic
